deploy.startCommand: bash -lc 'if [ -f app/wsgi.py ]; then exec gunicorn app.wsgi:app --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --workers 2 --worker-class gthread --threads 1 --timeout 120 --graceful-timeout 120 --log-level debug --capture-output --enable-stdio-inheritance --log-file -; elif [ -f wsgi.py ]; then exec gunicorn wsgi:app --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --workers 2 --worker-class gthread --threads 1 --timeout 120 --graceful-timeout 120 --log-level debug --capture-output --enable-stdio-inheritance --log-file -; else echo "No wsgi entrypoint found (tried app/wsgi.py and wsgi.py)"; exit 1; fi'
